entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as someone who is frustrated and wants to practice something useful. She mentions catching up on Cheering Charms.

entities.name: professor trelawney
entities.description: Professor Trelawney is introduced as a clairvoyant who offers to help others interpret the shadowy portents within their Orb.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as someone who thinks he knows what the portents mean, and that there will be loads of fog tonight.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as someone who feels his heart sinking when Professor Trelawney approaches their table to look at the crystal ball.

entities.name: parvati
entities.description: Parvati is mentioned as one of the people looking scandalized at Harry and Hermione's behavior.

entities.name: lavender
entities.description: Lavender is mentioned as one of the people looking scandalized at Harry and Hermione's behavior.

relationships.description: Hermione interacts with Professor Trelawney when she offers to help others interpret the shadowy portents within their Orb.
Ron interacts with Professor Trelawney when he whispers that it's obvious what the portents mean.
Harry interacts with Professor Trelawney when she approaches their table to look at the crystal ball.
Parvati reacts to Harry and Hermione's behavior by looking scandalized.
Lavender reacts to Harry and Hermione's behavior by looking scandalized.
